item.description:
Hey everyone!

Come and show your support for the Sustainable Academy for Kids summer program happening in July at the Growing Green Co-op, 197 New Britian Ave, Hftd, CT- 06106.
The talent show will be a complete blast! Come have fun performing, watching, and looking at art from our fellow in residence artists, including Imani herself and her daughter Malaika, as well as possibly my brother Johnny.
Come have fun, and join in the spirit of harmony, community and support, taking place this magical night.

Can't wait to see you all there!!!!

Cassie Zito
item.name: Talent Show Fundraiser for the Sustainable Academy for Kids
